name: Image processing - Object detection
shortDescription: This model detects object from the images inside topic
longDescription:
This sample shows how to use HTTP Writer API in the command-line.
Name the output topic or select one from the list.
Copy and paste the code sample.
Execute it in command line.
Once you start sending data, it will be streamed into Quix. You can explore the selected topic from Quix/topics to visualize it. The sample is formatted to run in a Linux/Unix environment but can be easily edited to run in a Windows terminals. For more information on streaming data to Quix via HTTP, see Quix docs.

Variables.Name: topic_raw
Variables.Description: Input topic containing unprocessed images from source

Variables.Name: topic_processed
Variables.Description: Output topic containing images with topics inside them
